mapper.insert:
select NEWS_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into news(news_no, news_title, news_content, news_uploadname, news_filesize, news_originalname) values(#{newsNo}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsContent}, #{newsUploadname}, #{newsFilesize}, #{newsOriginalname})
mapper.select: select* from ( select rownum as RNUM, A.* from ( select * from news order by news_no desc )A ) where RNUM between 1 and 3
